# Fyne GUI Foundation

## Description

Foundation for the desktop GUI application using the Fyne framework. This project establishes the core GUI infrastructure that will replace or complement the console interface, providing a modern desktop application experience.

## Scope

This project focuses on:
- **Foundation**: Initial Fyne framework integration and basic GUI structure
- **Comprehensive GUI**: Complete desktop GUI implementation for all application features

## Milestones

1. **GUI Foundation** - Core Fyne framework setup and basic GUI structure

## Implementation Phases

- **Phase 1: Foundation** - Set up Fyne framework and basic GUI structure

## Timeline

- **Start Date**: 2026-01-16
- **End Date**: 2026-01-17
- **Duration**: 2 days (1 issue per day)

## Issues

- #50: Implement desktop GUI using Fyne framework
- #53: Add comprehensive desktop GUI with Fyne for all features

## Notes

This project provides the foundation for all GUI features. Once completed, the GUI Features project will build upon this foundation to add specific GUI components and visualizations.
